room_title: Escape room "The Boiler Room" by Rugged Xscape in Lafayette (IN)
room_description:
Your friend has gone missing, and the police have deemed it a "cold case." You refuse to let her become a statistic, so you gather some friends to see what you can find out. You have seen some suspicious activity at the old, abandoned factory on the outskirts of town.
Your group decides to investigate. You quickly realize you have gotten in way over your head and your heroic endeavor has quickly turned into a sinister game of cat and mouse that has uncovered something much, much worse. Can you find out what happened to your friend or will you become another "cold case"?
